# Action needed: We can't process your request for a Higher-Level Review

Dear <redacted>,

You submitted a request for a Higher-Level Review (VA Form 20-0996), but we had a problem with our system. We can’t process your form. We’re sorry about this.

## What to do next
You'll need to submit your form again. We recommend you submit your form again by mail or in person.

You’ll need to download and fill out a Decision Review Request: Higher-Level Review (VA Form 20-0996).

(action-link)[Get VA Form 20-0996 to download](https://www.va.gov/find-forms/about-form-20-0996/)\u2028

### Option 1: By mail
Mail the completed form to this address:

(address)Department of Veterans Affairs | Claims Intake Center | PO Box 4444 | Janesville, WI 53547-4444

### Option 2: In person
Bring the completed form to a VA regional office.
[Find a VA regional office near you](https://www.va.gov/find-locations/)

**Note:** You can ask a VA regional office for copies of the forms to fill out. Or call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711) to request forms. We’re here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET. 

> ## Submission Details
> ### Form submitted
> **Decision Reviews Request: Higher-Level Review**
> VA Form 20-0996
>
> ### Date submitted
> <redacted>


## What to do if you have questions
Call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711). We’re here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

Thank you

***

You're receiving this email because you submitted a form on [VA.gov](http://www.va.gov). Don't reply to this email.
